text: Share your code and we can look at it

Yes. Select "Email" when creating the module in design manager.

Just be aware that email modules are a different beast than website modules. You'll have to make sure they work on all email clients including Outlook 2016.

<http://Litmus.org|Litmus.org> has a bunch of good resources on coding emails so if you ever see a google result from them, that's the one to read.
